	});
});

<script>
function UnCryptMailto(s){
    var n = 0;
    var r = "";
    for( var i = 0; i < s.length; i++){
        n = s.charCodeAt(i);
        if( n >= 8364 ){
            n = 128;
        }
        r += String.fromCharCode( n - 1 );
    }
    return r;
}
function linkTo_UnCryptMailto(s){
    location.href=UnCryptMailto(s);
}

<script>
	

	function ageResMessage(msgID){
		var ageResMsg;
		switch (msgID) {
	    case "connErrorDOBUpdate":
	    	ageResMsg = '<span class="pink">Oops!</span> We’re experiencing technical dificulties. Please try again later.';
	        break;
	    case "LoadingWait":
	    	ageResMsg = 'Please wait...';
	        break;
	    case "noDOBSelected":
	    	ageResMsg = 'To continue shopping, please add your date of birth below.';
	        break;
	    case "ajaxError":
	    	ageResMsg = '<span class="pink">Oops!</span> We’re experiencing technical dificulties. Please try again later.';
	        break;
	    case "AgeOutOfRange":
	    	ageResMsg = 'Sorry, but you’ve not met the product’s age requirements to purchase this product.';
	        break;
	    case "mismatch":
	    	ageResMsg = 'Sorry, the details you’ve entered do not match the records with Equifax. Please re-check your details or contact our Customer Team for more details.';
	        break;
	    case "connErrorEquifax":
	    	ageResMsg = '<span class="pink">Oops!</span> We’re experiencing technical dificulties. Please try again later.';
	        break;
	    case "AgeTermsConds":
	    	ageResMsg = '<span class="msg">To purchase this age-restricted product, we need to validate your age. We will pass your details to a third party to run a check to confirm you are old enough to purchase the product. By clicking the "OK" button, you are agreeing to our <a href="/Age-Restrict-Info" title="Terms & conditions" target="_blank"> terms & conditions</a>.</span>';
	        break;
	    default: 
	    	ageResMsg = '';
		}
		return ageResMsg;
	}
</script>

<div class="sc filter filter-box clearfix">
	
		
		
		<div class="name" style="overflow: hidden;" title="Refine by price"> <span class="bullet"></span>
          <p class="nopad nomargin medium-text" style="text-transform: capitalize;">refine by price</p>
        </div>
		
		
		







<div class="range-slider-container content clearfix">

	

	<div class="slider-range"></div>
	<div class="amount min-amount left"></div>
	<div class="amount max-amount right"></div>
	

	<form action="#" method="get" class="range-slider-form hidden">
		<input type="hidden" class="slider_q" name="q" value="head:relevance" />
		<input type="hidden" name="text" value="head" />
		<input type="hidden" class="slider_step" value="1" />
		<input type="hidden" class="slider_min" name="minSel" value="1.0" /> 
		<input type="hidden" class="slider_max" name="maxSel" value="100.0" /> 
		<input type="hidden" class="price_min" name="minSlider" value="1.0" /> 
		<input type="hidden" class="price_max" name="maxSlider" value="100.0" />
		<input type="hidden" name="resultsForPage" value="20" />
	</form>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var slider_step = $(".range-slider-container form .slider_step"),
	price_min = $(".range-slider-container form .price_min"),
	price_max = $(".range-slider-container form .price_max"),
	slider_min = $(".range-slider-container form .slider_min"),
	slider_max = $(".range-slider-container form .slider_max");

$( ".slider-range" ).slider({
	range: true,
	min: parseInt(price_min.val()),
	max: parseInt(price_max.val()),
	step: parseInt(slider_step.val()),
	values: [ parseInt(slider_min.val()), parseInt(slider_max.val()) ],
	slide: function(event, ui){
		//Sliding number
        $('.ui-slider-handle:eq(0) .price-range-min').html('£' + ui.values[0]);
        $('.ui-slider-handle:eq(1) .price-range-max').html('£' + ui.values[1]);
        $('.price-range-both').html('<i>£' + ui.values[0] + ' - </i>£' + ui.values[1] );
        
        if ( ui.values[0] == ui.values[1] ){
          $('.price-range-both i').css('display', 'none');
        } else{
          $('.price-range-both i').css('display', 'inline');
        }
        if (collision($('.price-range-min'), $('.price-range-max')) == true){
            $('.price-range-min, .price-range-max').css('opacity', '0');    
            $('.price-range-both').css('display', 'block');     
        } else{
            $('.price-range-min, .price-range-max').css('opacity', '1');    
            $('.price-range-both').css('display', 'none');      
        }
	},
	change: function(event, ui){
		/* update the values and submit the form */
		slider_min.val(ui.values[0]);
		slider_max.val(ui.values[1]);

        $(document).trigger('GTM.FacetClick', ['Refine by price', "["+ui.values[0]+" TO "+ui.values[1]+"]", true, true]);

		//Fade Product Items
		$("#product-tiles").animate({opacity:0});

		// getting search query string from html
		var q = $(".range-slider-container form .slider_q");
		
		// create string from array and add priceValue and prices in required format.
		var qrystr = q.val();
		if (qrystr.indexOf("priceValue") == -1){
			var r = qrystr+":priceValue:["+ui.values[0]+" TO "+ui.values[1]+"]";
		}
		else{
			var a = qrystr.split(":");
			var indexNum = a.indexOf("priceValue");
			a.splice(indexNum,2);
			var r = a.join(":")+":priceValue:["+ui.values[0]+" TO "+ui.values[1]+"]";
		}
		q.val(r);
		// Submit the form
		$(".range-slider-container .range-slider-form").submit();
	}
});

var minselected = parseInt($(".slider-range").slider("values",0)),
	maxselected = parseInt($(".slider-range").slider("values",1));

$('.ui-slider-range').append('<span class="price-range-both value"><i>£' + minselected + ' - </i>' + maxselected + '</span>');
$('.ui-slider-handle:eq(0)').append('<span class="price-range-min value">£' + minselected + '</span>');
$('.ui-slider-handle:eq(1)').append('<span class="price-range-max value">£' + maxselected + '</span>');

//Collison of Min/Max Price
function collision($div1, $div2){
    var x1 = $div1.offset().left,
        w1 = 40,
        r1 = x1 + w1,
        x2 = $div2.offset().left,
        w2 = 40,
        r2 = x2 + w2;
    
 	if (r1 < x2 || x1 > r2) return false;
 	return true;
}
</script>
</div>
